requirements.name: Periodic Report (Form 802)
requirements.description: Annual report filed with the Texas Secretary of State to maintain active status

requirements.name: Charitable Organization Registration
requirements.description: Registration with the Texas Attorney General for organizations soliciting donations (if gross revenue exceeds threshold)

requirements.name: Form 990 Series
requirements.description: IRS Form 990, 990-EZ, or 990-N required for tax-exempt organizations

requirements.name: Sales Tax Exemption Certificate Renewal
requirements.description: Renew sales tax exemption certificate with the Texas Comptroller

requirements.name: Franchise Tax Report
requirements.description: Texas franchise tax report (most nonprofits are exempt but must file to maintain exemption)

requirements.name: Unemployment Tax Registration
requirements.description: Register with Texas Workforce Commission if organization has employees

notes: Texas has relatively light regulatory requirements for nonprofits compared to other states. No state income tax simplifies compliance. Organizations with gross revenue under $50,000 may be exempt from Attorney General registration.

key_agencies.name: Texas Attorney General - Charitable Trusts Section
